required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: to Assess the Accuracy and Reliability of the Ga68-Dolacga Positron Emission Tomography Compared to Computer Tomography Volumetry and Indocyanine Green Retention Test for Measurement of Liver Reserve
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Comparative Phase II Clinical Trial to Assess the Accuracy and Reliability of the Ga68-Dolacga Positron Emission Tomography Compared to Computer Tomography Volumetry and Indocyanine Green Retention Test for Measurement of Liver Reserve Among Scheduled Surgery Operation Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Nuclear Energy Research, Taiwan

clinical_study.source: Institute of Nuclear Energy Research, Taiwan

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase 2 open-labeled study to compare the Ga68-Dolacga positron emission tomography with computer tomography volumetry and indocyanine green retention test for measurement of liver reserve among scheduled surgery operation patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a phase 2 open-labeled study to compare the Ga68-Dolacga positron emission tomography with computer tomography volumetry (CTV) and indocyanine green retention test (ICGR15) for measurement of liver reserve among scheduled surgery operation patients. The goal is to enroll 30 eligible subjects scheduled for surgery operation.
CTV and ICGR15 will occur within 7 days prior to the imaging visit for all eligible subjects. During the imaging visit (visit 2, Day 1), subjects will receive an iv bolus injection of 2.0±1.0 mCi Ga68-Dolacga Injection. Ga68-Dolacga PET will be kinetically performed 60 minutes immediately after iv injection.
Two follow-up visits (visit 3 at Day 7±2 and visit 4 at Day 14±2) will be conducted to confirm subject well-being and to collect information about any new adverse events (if any).

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of liver reserve obtained from Ga68-Dolacga PET performed in patients scheduled surgical operation (Percentage of injection dose, %ID)
primary_outcome.description: The liver reserve obtained from Ga68-Dolacga PET is expressed in "percentage of injection dose (%ID)."

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of liver reserve obtained from CTV performed in patients scheduled surgical operation (Remnant volume rate (%))
primary_outcome.description: The liver reserve obtained from computer tomography volumetry (CTV) is expressed in "remnant volume rate (%)."

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of future liver remnant volume rate (FLRV%)
primary_outcome.description: The future liver remnant volume rate (FLRV%) is calculated by dividing the future remnant liver volume by the total functional liver volume from CTV and expressed as %.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of future liver remnant function rate (FLRF%)
primary_outcome.description: The future liver remnant function rate (FLRV%) is calculated by dividing the uptake in the future remnant liver volume by the uptake in the total liver volume from Ga68-Dolacga PET and expressed as %.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation of the percentage of injection dose (%ID) in liver determined by Ga68-Dolacga PET with conventional liver function tests
primary_outcome.description: The conventional liver function tests parameters include alanine aminotransferase (U/L), aspartate aminotransferase (U/L), total bilirubin (mg/dL), direct bilirubin (mg/dL), gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (U/L), total protein (g/dL), albumin/globulin ratio, albumin (g/dL), prothrombin time/International Normalized Ratio (PT/INR), platelet count (×10^3/μL), ICGR15 (%), Child-Pugh classification (Class A to Class C), MELD score.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation of the remnant volume rate determined by CTV with conventional liver function tests
primary_outcome.description: The conventional liver function tests parameters include alanine aminotransferase (U/L), aspartate aminotransferase (U/L), total bilirubin (mg/dL), direct bilirubin (mg/dL), gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (U/L), total protein (g/dL), albumin/globulin ratio, albumin (g/dL), prothrombin time/International Normalized Ratio (PT/INR), platelet count (×10^3/μL), ICGR15 (%), Child-Pugh classification (Class A to Class C), MELD score.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation of the ICGR15 with the conventional liver function tests
primary_outcome.description: The conventional liver function tests parameters include alanine aminotransferase (U/L), aspartate aminotransferase (U/L), total bilirubin (mg/dL), direct bilirubin (mg/dL), gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (U/L), total protein (g/dL), albumin/globulin ratio, albumin (g/dL), prothrombin time/International Normalized Ratio (PT/INR), platelet count (×10^3/μL), Child-Pugh classification (Class A to Class C), MELD score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation of the percentage of injection dose (%ID) in liver determined by Ga68-Dolacga PET with the fibrosis indices
secondary_outcome.description: The fibrosis indices include liver stiffness measurement (kPa) determined by Fibroscan and the Fibrosis-4 (FIB-4) index.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation of the ICGR15 with the fibrosis indices
secondary_outcome.description: The fibrosis indices include liver stiffness measurement (kPa) determined by Fibroscan and the Fibrosis-4 (FIB-4) index.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant changes in systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with body temperature abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant changes in Heart Rate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects reporting clinically significant changes in serum biochemical tests
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects reporting clinically significant changes in hematological tests
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects reporting clinically significant changes in urinalysis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant changes in electrocardiogram(ECG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from pre-dose to 14±2 days post dose
secondary_outcome.description: The ECG parameters include: PR interval (milliseconds), QTc interval (milliseconds), QRS duration (milliseconds)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.description: All laboratory abnormalities which are compared with screening values and out of the reference range will be considered as AE and will be assessed its relationship to the study drug. Any ECG changes including ECG waveform will be assessed as AE(s) and will be followed to assess whether they resolved and when they resolved.

secondary_outcome.measure: Severity grading of PHLF as defined by the International Study Group of Liver Surgery (ISGLS)
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects diagnosed with PHLF are classified as grade A, grade B or grade C based on its severity.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of CTV and Ga68-Dolacga PET parameters in patients with PHLF
secondary_outcome.description: Following parameters will be compared: liver reserve obtained from CTV vs liver reserve obtained from Ga68-Dolacga PET FLRV% vs FLRF%

arm_group.description: Ga68-Dolacga will be administered via iv bolus injection followed by a whole-body PET/CT scan for liver reserve evaluation.

intervention.description: Ga68-Dolacga Injection, 2.0±1.0 mCi, single dose, iv bolus
